channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Log4j
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Log4j

item.title: CVE-2020-9488|2024-08-04T10:26:16.370Z -- apache -- apache%20log4j
item.description: Improper validation of certificate with host mismatch in Apache Log4j SMTP appender. This could allow an SMTPS connection to be intercepted by a man-in-the-middle attack which could leak any log messages sent through that appender. Fixed in Apache Log4j 2.12.3 and 2.13.1
